Interface IMenu<T extends User>

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChangePasswordAdminMenu, ChangePasswordMenu, CreateCampMenu, CreateUserMenu, DeleteCampMenu, DeleteEnquiryMenu, DeleteSuggestionMenu, EditCampMenu, EditEnquiryMenu, EditSuggestionMenu, GenerateCampReportCommitteeMenu, GenerateCampReportStaffMenu, LockUserMenu, PrintProfileMenu, ProcessSuggestionMenu, RaiseEnquiryMenu, RegisterCampCommitteeMenu, RegisterCampStudentMenu, ReplyToEnquiriesMenu, ReplyToEnquiryStaffMenu, SubmitSuggestionMenu, UnlockUserMenu, UserLogoutMenu, ViewAllEnquiriesMenu, ViewAllEnquiriesStaffMenu, ViewBlockedDatesMenu, ViewCampStaffMenu, ViewCampStudentMenu, ViewCreatedCampsStaffMenu, ViewMyCommitteeCampMenu, ViewMyRegisteredCampMenu, ViewMySubmittedEnquiriesMenu, ViewMySubmittedSuggestionsMenu, ViewSuggestionMenu, WithdrawCampMenu
public interface IMenu<T extends User>
The interface IMenu provides a contract for common functionality for all menu pages in this camp management applciation. The required class to be implemented includes getMenuDescription and runMenu.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getMenuDescription()
    Provides a description message of the menu.
    void
    runMenu(T userObject)
    Runs the menu.

  • Method Details

    • getMenuDescription

      String getMenuDescription()
      Provides a description message of the menu.
      Returns:
      The String description of the menu.

    • runMenu

      void runMenu(T userObject) throws CampException
      Runs the menu. This includes displaying the menu specific instruction message, handling user input, and execute the menu logic.
      Parameters:
      userObject - The user that runs the menu
      Throws:
      CampException - If the camp cannot be modified based on user's input
